homepage.name: I'm Jensen Yuen
homepage.aboutme: Borned and raised in Singapore. Career-changer. Currently, pursing a career as a Full-stack Developer.

portfoilo.subtext: This section contains work that I have contributed to developing.

offgrid.title: Offgrid
offgrid.info: Offgrid was developed to help novice hikers prepare for their hiking trip. We identified the lack of concise information for hikers and the lack of communication between hikers and their family and/or friends.

scubadoo.title: Scubadoo
scubadoo.info: Scubadoo is a marketplace clone (of Padi) developed within 3 days, this app was created to help divers locate dive centers and dive listings around the world.

gathersg.title: GatherSG
gathersg.info: Maintained and developed features. Engaged with stakeholders and users to provide support for their issues. Developed REST API for system integrations.

aboutpage.title: About this webpage
aboutpage.subtext: This page contains the tech stack and tools used to create this page.
